an5.106:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.106:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.106:2.1: “Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu saṃghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:2.2: “Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:2.3: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṃghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti.
an5.106:3.1: “Siyā pana, bhante, aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṃghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:3.3: Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:3.5: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṃghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti.
an5.106:4.1: “Siyā pana, bhante, aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:4.3: Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:4.5: apaññāto ca hoti, tena ca apaññātakena no paritassati;
an5.106:4.6: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti.
an5.106:5.1: “Siyā pana, bhante, aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṃghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:5.3: Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:5.5: apaññāto ca hoti, tena ca apaññātakena no paritassati;
an5.106:5.6: catunnañca jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.106:5.7: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṃghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti.
an5.106:6.1: “Siyā pana, bhante, aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṃghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:6.3: Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:6.5: apaññāto ca hoti, tena ca apaññātakena no paritassati;
an5.106:6.6: catunnañca jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.106:6.7: āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati;
an5.106:6.8: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṃghe viharanto phāsuṃ vihareyya.
an5.106:7.1: Imamhā cāhaṃ, ānanda, phāsuvihārā añño phāsuvihāro uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthīti vadāmī”ti.
